thread.title: GeForce website countdown teases Nvidia GTX 1080 Ti graphics card launch at GDC
thread.title_full: GeForce website countdown teases Nvidia GTX 1080 Ti graphics card launch at GDC

author: pcworld.com
title: GeForce website countdown teases Nvidia GTX 1080 Ti graphics card launch at GDC
text:
Nvidia isn’t letting AMD steal the spotlight with its new Ryzen CPU and Vega graphics card. When AMD announced a “Capsaicin” livestream to talk Radeon Vega details at GDC on February 28, Nvidia revealed a GeForce event for the very same day . Today, information about AMD’s Ryzen CPU pricing and performance launched—and Nvidia started a countdown to said GeForce event on the GeForce.com homepage . Subtle.
